Traverse through a broken world and survive through the mechanical monstrosities that have managed to survive the calamity... But don't worry, cue in MLBY, a strange mechanical butterfly sidekick, and you'll be ready to illuminate your way past beauty, perils, and adventure. By interacting with objects and the environment you can overcome your enemies as you figure out the mysteries of both you and MLBY. Lanterns will mark your progress through the eerie darkness.

name: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood: Deluxe Edition
summary:
This Deluxe Edition contains: 
 
- Assassin's Creed Brotherhood (base game) 
- Additional single-player mission: Aquaducts and Trajan Market 
- The Harlequin and Officer multiplayer characters 
- Helmschmied Drachen Armor for Ezio 
- Digital multiplayer characters trading cards 
- Map of Rome 
- A download for the movie Assassin’s Creed: Lineage 
- Digital soundtrack 
- Making-of for Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood

name: Nummels
summary: Nummels are dumb but predictable little guys. They’ll always interact with what’s in front of them, even if it’s a chewed up piece of gum. So toss them a ladder, dig a path, place a bridge, or blast a wall. Get them home safely in this medium skill platformer. Use your brain, they won’t use theirs!

name: Attack on Pearl Harbor
summary: In this historic war game you can play as either the Axis or the Allies on that day which will live in infamy.

name: R.A.W: Realms of Ancient War
summary: In this explosive Hack'n'Slash action/role-playing game, R.A.W takes you, alone or with a friend in co-operative mode, on a fantasy world ruined by an ancient and violent war. Level your heroes up, collect more powerful weapons and armor, unlock new and more devastating spells, and exterminate by the dozens at once the hordes of enemies that are standing in your way.

name: Face au train
summary: Face au train, do not risk your life at the station avoid dangerous behavior. Test your knowledge of the right behaviors to adopt around the railway tracks.

name: Slime Tactics
summary: Following on from Ambition of the Slimes, you once again empower the weakest ‘enemies’ in gaming; this time around you lead a broad variety of slimes in real time strategy battles. Across lots of stages you utilise the varied abilities and capabilities of the slimes to achieve victory against colourful enemies!

name: Street Shuffle
summary: Street Shufflie is a sliding puzzle game where you need to guide your taxi to the other exit tile without crashing. After each round you need to spend your earned money to re-stock on fuel, pay for maintainance, and so on.

name: Halo 3: Limited Edition
summary:
Has a three-way folding steel container.
Bestiarum: A hard cover, bound collection of information and art covering the species, cultures and civilizations of Halo 3.
A relatively small poster of John-117 and the Arbiter.
An illuminating collection of original "Halo 3" storyboard art from artist Lee Wilson, depicting key moments and pivotal scenes from the epic cinematic production of "Halo."
An extra disc that contains exclusive, behind-the-scenes footage and videos, a high-definition "Making of 'Halo 3'," a documentary showcasing the Bungie team and its effort to create the most anticipated title in the industry's history, numerous high-definition featurettes documenting the creative design processes involved in developing the game; and a look at some early game concepts and their evolution through the game's development.
The extra disc contains an audio-visual calibration tool.

name: The Chronicles of Nyanya
summary: An epic tale of cats in funny costumes. Full of surprising and amazing twists and drama of an individual entangled in the vicissitudes of a student internship and adventures featuring friendly pastry.

name: Spinning Maze
summary: Control and rotate the maze to reach the end.

name: Smoke and Sacrifice
summary:
In Smoke and Sacrifice players assume the role of Sachi, a young mother on a quest to discover the fate of her child. The game takes place in a darkly fantastical world where grotesque plant life and animals roam and harsh societal customs rule. Taking cues from modern survival classics, Smoke and Sacrifice evolves the genre with its intensely personal story and complex ecosystem. Creatures forage, mate, breed and prey on one another, creating a living world. Only by taming the game’s wilds can Sachi hope to unravel the mystery at the heart of Smoke and Sacrifice. 
 
Depicted in a beautiful, hand-painted style, Smoke and Sacrifice’s storybook visuals disguise its brutal story of motherhood and survival. Sachi doesn’t just have to worry about the game’s antagonists - the entire game world poses a threat. Players can alter the behaviour of plant and animal life, but this may also limit the resources Sachi has to craft items from. The deadly smoke also poses unique challenges throughout the game, altering enemy as well as player behaviour.

name: Cool Ball
summary: What's a little round guy to do? Here you are, bouncing along happily in the predawn of the universe with your girlfriend, Suzzette. Then along comes the BIG BANG and *WHAM* - off she goes flying through time, screaming for help! She's counting on you to travel through time and find her! You'll need to collect various objects along the way, all of which must be collected in order to complete each level. You'll encounter hungry piranhas, gnarly pterodactyls, giant killer rats and treacherous swooping birds on your journey. So think fast and keep on bouncing!

name: Fate/Grand Order VR feat. Mash Kyrielight
summary: PlayStation VR game.

name: Yuletide Legends: Who Framed Santa Claus
summary: Take on the role of an experienced detective and get carried away by a winter adventure amid frozen lands. Find hidden motives of the antagonist and save Santa Claus from a false conviction in this seasonal Hidden Objects adventure.

name: Alchemelee
summary: Alchemelee is a potion-brewing party game that can be played with up to 4 players. Grow ingredients, make potions, and use them to affect the actions of other players, or be the first to make all three of your designated potions to...

name: Above - VR
summary:
Above is a virtual experience that place the player in the position of a stranded astronaut in space.  
Join the main character in a visually stunning experience during the last minutes of his life.

name: RetroDrift: Retrowave Online Road
summary: Dive into the atmosphere of the 80's, rushing along the neon roads towards the sunset, letting your supercar drift, enjoying the wonderful tracks in retrowave style.

name: Mall Craze
summary: Build your own Shopping Center in Mall Craze. Build, customize and manage your creation. Attract customers to your mall and face many challenges on the road to success.

name: Enigmes & Objets Cachés : Le destin de Marie-Antoinette
Battlefield Play4Free
summary: Battlefield Play4Free is a first-person shooter video game developed by EA Digital Illusions CE and Easy Studios and published by EA. Based on the Battlefield series, the game features a modern warfare battlefield setting.

name: MicroHorrorArcade Trilogy I - Andy's Story
summary: An anthology about a guy named Andy who finds himself in some interesting situations.

name: Coloring Book
summary: Coloring Book has 62 beautiful drawings and 18 whiteboards.
